title: pixel 4 freezes when clicking on a link in google search. tried factory setting reset.
content: The phone freezes when clicking on any link from the google search bar.  Have to re--start the phone to get out of it.  Did a factory re-set, still freezes.  Also, no games or such on the phone.  few apps but i deleted and tested the phone and it still freezes so not the apps either.
